name: Father's Love
description:
Another nightmare game based on a lil dream I had a few years back.

The name has nothing to do with it, it's what Micah wanted to call it.

Yet another hellish 3 hour HPS1 collab.

Just like Boiling Static, use WASD to move, ARROWS to look.

---

Find god

Bring him home

Made with HPSXRP, sorry

---
